2.title: Prophylactics

episode of.title: A Ladies' Guide to Making Conversation More Interesting (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Miriam loves safe sex with men, but is bored when her dates try to negotiate their way out of a condom. Her friends Nancy and Veronika must find a way to make the prophylactic conversation more interesting before Miriam gives up on sex altogether!

-1.title: A Ladies' Guide to Making Conversation More Interesting, Episode 1

episode of.title: A Ladies' Guide to Making Conversation More Interesting (TV Series 2015– )

-1.plot: The next hipster house party is rapidly approaching, and three Ladies aren't so sure they can stomach another evening of boring small-talk. In a world where people talk only about the same old things, the Ladies have to imagine a way to make conversation more interesting... or risk exiting the social circuit for good.

locations: Washington Heights, Manhattan, New York City, New York, USA::(Apartment)
Woodside, Queens, New York City, New York, USA::(Apartment)
imdb.plot outline: A LADIES' GUIDE TO MAKING CONVERSATION MORE INTERESTING is a series of training videos dedicated to teaching young ladies the art of making fascinating conversation. The programme is presented by the Bronson-Alcott Foundation for Social Excellence.
imdb.title: A Ladies' Guide to Making Conversation More Interesting
